4.definition: Science product of eddy parameters over Bay of Bengal.

5.definition: Characterizing Ocean Eddy activities in the Bay of Bengal using Altimeter data

6.definition: The oceanic eddy parameter information over Bay of Bengal was prepared for 24 years (1993 – 2016) using AVISO merged and gridded satellite altimeter sea surface height (SSH) data. SSH anomaly at 7-day interval having special resolution of 0.25o has been used for present study.

7.definition: M. Jishad, OSD/AOSG/EPSA, SAC (ISRO), Ahmedabad-380015, India. Ph: +91 79 2691 6117. Email:jishadm@sac.isro.gov.in

13.definition: Altimter, sea surface height, Oceanic eddy, Bay of Bengal, Cyclonic and anti-cyclonic

15.definition: Jishad M, Rashmi Sharma and Neeraj Agarwal, Space Applications Centre (ISRO), Ahmedabad-380015, India

16a.definition: Mesoscale oceanic eddies have been identified and tracked in weekly merged altimeter product of Sea Surface Height (SSH) in the Bay of Bengal during the period 1993-2016.

16b.definition: M. Jishad, OSD/AOSG/EPSA, SAC (ISRO), Ahmedabad-380015, India. Ph: +91 79 2691 6117. Email:jishadm@sac.isro.gov.in

16c.definition: Scientist/Engineer, OSD/AOSG/EPSA, SAC (ISRO), Ahmedabad-380015, India. Ph: +91 79 2691 6117. Email:jishadm@sac.isro.gov.in

16d.metadata_element: Vertical Extent (minimumValue, maximumValue, unitOfMeasure, vertical datum)
16d.definition: time(time): units = "days since 1950-1-1 00:00:00" : calendar = "Gregorian"; EddyNumber(EddyNumber): “Number of the eddy”; flag(flag): "1 for anticyclonic and 2 for cyclonic"; eddy_id(time, EddyNumber, flag): “eddy id number”; cent_lat(time, EddyNumber, flag): Eddy centre latitude : units = "degree_north"; cent_lon(time, EddyNumber, flag):Eddy centre longitude : units = "degree_east"; amp_ed(time, EddyNumber, flag):Amplitude of the eddy : units = "cm"; sca_ed(time, EddyNumber, flag):Scale of the eddy : units = "km"; are_ed(time, EddyNumber, flag): Area of the eddy : units = "km^2";

17.definition: Longitude: 78OE to 100O E Latitude : 5ON to 25O N

19.definition: Longitude : 78OE to 100O E Latitude : 5ON to 25O N Resolution : 0.25 O

20.definition: Based on input AVISO data from 1993-2016 (24 years)

23.definition: Level 4 (Data product derived from The weakly gridded map of Absolute Dynamic Topography data)
